text: Expression of <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in follicular center ( FC ) B cells of reactive lymph nodes and FC - derived non-Hodgkin lymphomas .

Chromosomal translocation resulting in abnormal expression of the <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene in B cells has been implicated in the tumorigenesis of non-Hodgkin lymphoma ( NHL ) .

text: Therefore we studied the expression pattern of <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> by in situ hybridization with synthetic oligonucleotide probes in frozen tissue sections from five reactive lymph nodes and 38 B cell and non-B NHL .

In addition , we investigated the expression of <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> by Northern blot analysis on multiple human tissues .

The <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcript was found in a variety of tissues , including skeletal muscle , peripheral blood leukocytes , and weakly in normal lymph nodes .

In the tumor samples , expression of <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was observed in 68 % of all B cell NHL and none of the non-B lymphomas .

All cases of follicular , mixed small and large cell lymphomas showed <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression confined to the neoplastic follicles .

text: A follicular expression pattern was also found in all non-malignant reactive lymph nodes .

Hence , the expression of <extra_id_0> LAZ3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> BCL6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> does not correlate to malignancy , but reflects the origin of B cells from the germinal centers .
